project.title: Plantr
project.description: We're always struggling to keep our green friends in our office alive, so we developed this app to make the process a lot easier. No more sad plants.

project.title: Örebro Skylt och Dekor
project.description: We were contacted by a local print shop who needed a portfolio site in order to better display their wide range of services. In collaboration with their excellent designers, this site was made.
